values: So, Dabel Brothers will be adapting the entire WoT series into graphic novels. The first one is due for release in December. Anyone else excited?

...and thought I'd recommend a few pieces. Escape the Dancing Cartman - As Rand and Mat escape from the inn after Rand channels some lightening at Howel Gode. I especially love Mat's expression. Rand - Not sure about the bangs on this artist's take on Rand, but I adore the coat. Galad vs. Elayne - I love Elayne, but this had me in stitches. :D Another Rand - This anime-style Rand is absolutely gorgeous. I love the hair, the face, the eyes... even the hands. Rand's Fanclub - This one is classic. Why should Min, Elayne, and Aviendha get to have Rand all to themselves? Rand in Color Pencil - Rand's coat is so colorful o.o I like colors. >.> Rand and Min - Two things came to mind when I first saw this: "Rand's got big nipples," and "bow chika bow wow." Rand and Min are both very cuddly and peaceful. And nekkid. A Whitecloak Christmas - Greatest. Picture. Ever. A Partial Render of Rand - All I've got to say is, if Rand's fingers are really that long, then Min, Elayne, and Aviendha are very lucky women. o.O

Some of which might be the slightest bit offensive to over-sensitive, man-hating feminazis.


oh, i am teh meaness. :( Credit for item # 57 on the Rape Checklist icon goes to Encyclopedia Dramatica's article on rape. The rape clock is also courtesy of ED. Encyclopedia Dramatica = <3.

So, the first is inspired by The Prince's Tale. Snape is described as wearing an oversized smock under the big coat, and I think to myself, "Eh heh heh, he's wearing his mom's shirt." And then I think of those big old-school belts with the clunky buckles, and... well. I think it's the best thing I've ever drawn. >.> And the second is a Wheel of Time piece. Ahahaha... sucker. Aviendha is my favorite part of this. :D And some Harry Potter fanart recs. Snape the Dentist. I cackle in delight. Regulus and Kreacher. Deathly Hallows spoilers. Awww, and sadness. The Next Generation. Deathly Hallows spoilers. I was sceptical about these three, but... OMG CUTE!!1!11 >.<;;

Sooo... A Matt/Galad flavored comic-y thing. With the same cartoony art as before. Marginally better than stick figures. And soon I will get some hobbies or something. It's pretty long. Might take awhile to load. In other news, I think there's a skunk living underneath my house. I saw him come out from under it earlier tonight. *checks time* Er, last night. I've seen him before. He's very cute. I want to cuddle and love him. Except... not get sprayed with stinkiness.

Was playing around with a new image editor, Paint.Net. It has nothing on Photoshop, of course, but it's still a handy little tool. I had me some fun making cartoony WoT peoples--Rand, Galad and Elayne--with overlarge heads. He makes me think of The Family Guy, for some reason. I am amused. Maybe I'll do more people tomorrow. Unless I find something productive to do yeah like that's gonna happen

The first was inspired by 's post from a few days ago. The rest sprang from the blackened depths of my soul. Raping the staple of my childhood is very theraputic, somehow.
So, for a little TMI--Shredder/Raphael was the OTP of my childhood. When I was little, I loved playing with my Ninja Turtles toys. Raphael would always be in an abusive relationship with Leonardo (no, don't ask; I have no idea where that came from). Shredder would find out somehow, and they'd fall in love. Sometimes Shredder would turn good, sometimes Raph would turn evil, but they'd always end up bumpin' uglies.

59%Mingle2 - Free Online Dating Damnit, I really need to purchase a couple of guns and spend a few hours a week at the shooting range. You know, just in case. My mom, on the other hand, has used several types of guns, including an M16 assault rifle. She was in the Navy. ^_^ Meme ganked from . In other news, my birthday was last Monday. I made myself an amusing pair of pajama pants from this fabulously shiny material that has a rainbow background and happy looking fish on it. I find them utterly delightful. And very comfortable. But I put the pockets in a little too low. I went on a downloading spree lately and acquired all twelve episodes of Blood Ties, which I missed because I don't watch TV normally. Blood Ties, btw, is based on the Vicky Nelson novels by Tanya Huff. They're a fun, quick read, featuring PI's, cops, vampires, boy prostitutes (how I love thee, Tony) and a modern female protagonist who isn't a complete bitch. Tony, by the way, has his own spin-off book series: Smoke and Shadows, Smoke and Mirrors and Smoke and Ashes. Um. And there is (sweet, fluffy, non-graphic) mansex. I highly recommend them, even if you don't read the Vicky books.

So it's the end of the year at Uni. In my dorm area, we always have this gigantic dumpster set in the quad area between the two buildings that make up the dorm area. So I was heading over to the next building tonight to drink with some friends, and pause to watch some dumpster divers. Umm, ew. So I sort of prowl around the dumpster, watching this chick pull out a scooter, of all things--in excellent condition. And then I notice a pile this other guy is making on the edge of the dumpster. Do you know what he found? Books! A stack of around 12 books, that he'd found in the dumpster! And these weren't shoddy books, either; they all appeared to be in fairly good condition, not something I'd pass over in a bookstore because of wear-and-tear. Not textbooks, either, but actual novels. I mean, what the hell? Why on earth would you throw away a book? You could donate them to a used bookstore (we have several in the area) for free. But what really kills me is that every year, the dorms also have "donation areas," where you can stick stuff you don't want for other people to take. Why not just toss them on the pile? Anything that doesn't get taken by other students gets donated to St. Paul's or Salvation Army. Gah, people piss me off so much sometimes.

Created for your continued amusement and fangirl squeeing, Youko Koenma Productions, Inc. proudly presents:

The Wheel of Time Crack!Pairing Generator

Bemuse your friends, inspire your muse! , I demand you write a chapter of Love is Blind using this. Thank you, and good fishing.

The Gender Genie will analyze any block of text that you've written, and tell you what your gender is. I put in a chunk from An Infelicitous Proposal. Words: 761 (NOTE: The genie works best on texts of more than 500 words.) Female Score: 1021 Male Score: 1147 The Gender Genie thinks the author of this passage is: male! Well, I do indentify more strongly with my masculine side... ^^;; Apparently, the program uses some algorithm that judges gender based on what words are used. Some examples from the passage I used that are "masculine:" around, what, more, are, many, said, above. I guess male authors are more inclined to use these words than female authors...? Anyway, I was amused.

Cast parties are so much fun. But boy, I am sure am glad the dance concert I'm stage managing closed tonight. It has a deservedly bad reputation in the theatre department at my uni. It's a lot like that bunny in Monty Python and the Holy Grail: it looks fluffy and harmless at first, but really it's an evil beast that has giant fangs and will rip you limb from limb. Although, I sort of had an idea of what I was signing up for, since I was one of the costume designers when it last got department support (the year before last; the dance concert and 10 Minute Play Festival rotate years when they're supported, since the department doesn't have a big enough budget to support them both). So I knew it would be rough. I feel like I haven't had a life for the last few weeks. :( Closing night is always so... liberating. But it was still satisfying to work on. And last night we had a techie party in the theatre, which was all kinds of awesome. We drank lots, and played gaff ball, then went to Denny's at 3am. ^_^ Drinking two nights in a row isn't something I ususally do. But this show has been pretty stressful, so I guess I've earned a little indulgance. ...But I've got a terrible case of the hiccoughs, now. And it took forever to type this, 'cause I'm making mad amounts of typos.

List 12 characters from different fandoms first. (No cheating!) Then answer the questions under the cut. 1. Galad (Wheel of Time) 2. Cloud (FFVII) 3. Harry (Harry Potter) 4. Gabriel (Anita Blake) 5. Jaime Lannister (A Song of Ice and Fire) 6. Pellaz (Wraeththu) 7. Tony (Smoke and Shadows, etc.) 8. Vanyel (Valdemar series) 9. Andrew (Exquisite Corpse) 10. Raphael (TMNT) 11. Anton (Night Watch series) 12. Kurama (Yu Yu Hakusho) Have you read a Six/Eleven fic? Do you want to? Pellaz/Anton? o.O I don't think a crossover of this sort would have occured to anyone in the respective fandoms... But yes, I want to read some. ^_^ Do you think Four is hot? How hot? Yes. Hot enough to melt sand. What would happen if Twelve got Eight pregnant? Kurama/Vanyel mpreg. Wow. That would be interesting. It almost sounds like something I would write. Except I've never written mpreg >.>;; Can you rec any fic(s) about Nine? Oh god, how I wish Exquisite Corpse fanfic existed. That would rock my socks like whoa. Would Two and Six make a good couple? Cloud/Pellaz. Maybe? Well, they're both kinda angsty. Pellaz is quite kingly, but I bet Cloud is good at taking orders in bed. Five/Nine or Five/Ten? Why? Jaime/Raphael. Jaime is uber-dom. And Raph is a total bottom. What would happen if Seven walked in on Two and Twelve having sex? Kurama and Cloud doing the nasty, and Tony walks in. Umm... I think he'd join them. Make up a summary for a Three/Ten fic. Harry Potter takes a summer trip to New York after Hedwig is murdered by Death Eaters, looking for a new familiar. He finds the perfect pet, but Raphael objects muchly to carrying letters. Can Harry tame his new pet Ninja Turtle, or will Raphael turn him into a pet? Is there any such thing as One/Eight fluff? Galad/Vanyel. No, there is not. But there could be. Give me a few hours, and there very well could be.... Suggest a title for a Seven/Twelve hurt/comfort fic. Every Rose Whip Has Its Thorns What kind of plot device would you use if you wanted Four to deflower One? Lesse. Galad gets taken by a Portal Stone to a strange new world, and gets bit by a wereleopard. Gabriel takes Galad under his wing, and then rapes him on film. 'Cause Gabriel is evil like that. Does anyone on your friends list read Seven slash? Does anybody but me read Tanya Huff at all? o.o Does anyone on your friends list read Three het? There's het Harry Potter fanfiction? o.O I've never heard of such a thing... Does anyone on your friends list write or draw Eleven? No. But they should. Would anyone on your friends list write Two/Four/Five? No, don't think so. Cloud/Gabriel/Jaime? Wow. Poor Cloud.... What might Ten scream at a moment of great passion? GIVE ME A BREAK!!! ('s what Raph said in the opening song of the original cartoon series) If you wrote a song-fic about Eight, which song would you choose? Fist-Fucking Her Decomposed Cadaver by Torsofuck. Because it would be totally innappropriate If you wrote a One/Six/Twelve fic, what would the warnings be? Galad/Pellaz/Kurama. Umm, slash, smut, anal, pretty boy overload, PWP, beastiality, BDSM, hair play, plant sex. What might be a good pick-up line for Two to use on Ten? Cloud to Raphael: "I'm not part turtle, but I'd like to have some in me." When was the last time you read a fic about Five? Never. I'm not sure it exists. What is Six's super-secret kink? Hmm, Pellaz secretly has a fisting fetish. Would Eleven shag Nine? Drunk or Sober? If he did, it would be drunk, as Anton generally does not like the cock. And Andrew likes 'em younger. And deader. Andrew loves him some rigor mortis-stiffened cocks, oh yes. Not that Anton being alive at the start of the evening would bother him much... he'd just kill him later... >.> If Three and Seven get together, who tops? Harry. Tony is a total bottom. How would you feel if Seven/Eight was canon? Tony/Vanyel? .... but.... no.... o.O Two bottoms do not a top equal. Plus, Tony would ditch Vanyel's whiney emo ass after two weeks, tops.

If I made a WoT RP community, would anybody play? We could have several going on simultaneously that have nothing to do with one another... slashy games, "serious" games, silly games, etc. I think It would be lots of fun.

Of course, I fudged on some of the answers a little. Surely being stage manager/ASM for almost 20 different shows at semi(well, barely)-professional and post-secondary educational theatres is at least the equivalent of being the lead in a play, right? Plus, most self-styled drama nerds are just posers, anyway. How many of you have stage managed two shows at once? Hmm? HMMM? I am hardcore. Hardcore like a pirate. ...And I like books, too.

Just thought I'd pimp my latest WoT fic, An Infelicitous Proposal. There's slash, if you squint at it the right way. I was trying to work on that Ishamael/Rand ficlet I've been attempting to write, when this plot bunny invaded my mind. Damnit, I'm never going to get my Ishy/Rand smut finished.

Ah, the schoolworks and the theatre works are pwning my soul. x_x;; But next week I'll be going to Phoenix, AZ for the United States Institute for Theatre Technology's Annual Conference and Stage Expo. That will be loads of fun, I'm sure. And I'll get to see B-chan for the first time in, like, four years. Yay! Anyway, I thought I'd post some sketches I did of Min, Elayne and Aviendha. And some other random dude.

It's that special time of year for the lovely, witty and talented . It's too bad I hadn't realized sooner, or I'd have had more time to work on her *dun dun dun* BIRTHDAY PRESENT! Ahem. How easily I amuse myself... >.> So, Britt, I drew you a picture. I'm not the fabulously talented artist I'd wish to be, but I hope you like it. ^_^ It's better than stick figures, anyway.
I've decided to go ahead and post B-chan's WoT fanart. They're so purty. Just to reiterate--not mine, yeah? They're so cute ^_^ Hot... so hot.... *fans self*

I've been trying to write this Ishamael/Rand non-con fic, but I just... can't. I've got a few paragraphs, and I know exactly what I want to happen... But I just can't write it >.< I feel like I'm failing as a fanfic writer. Maybe the problem is that I haven't written any smut recently, not since that Logain (and several other Asha'man)/Rand piece I wrote at the beginning of summer break. My smut muscle has atrophied. Or maybe I just need to curl up with The Eye of the World again, and saturate myself in the evil insanity that is Ishamael in the first couple of books. On another Wheel of Time note, I was browsing through my picture folders when I came across three pieces of WoT fanart drawn for me by my good buddy Stephanie in high school (who goes by B-chan online, and was apparently extremely famous for her art in the DBZ (yuck) fandom). They're pretty spiffy; a sweet Rand/Mat one, a not-so-sweet Moridin/Rand one, and a rather non-con-y Shaidar Haran/Rand one. Hehe, I corrupted that girl so bad ^_^ Maybe I should post them or something. Man, I want some WoT slash RP. I spent all summer looking for people to play some WoT slash... to no avail, alas. Fucking AOL/AIM users >.> Oh, and more icon amusage for me.

And I decided to try experimenting with positions the other night. What I came up with isn't too bad, really. So it's Rand. After taking too many hits off the tabac pipe, Rand sits contemplatively in the darkness and asks himself, "Duuude, where's my hand?" *cough* Yeah, that movie was stupid.

I kinda fail at stick figure animation. But I love the new icon anyways. Actually, the 100x100px one looks a lot better... and is almost a hundred kb bigger than the 85x85px one. And, sadly, too big to upload. Oh, well. It has, like, a bajillion frames, anway. And I did some more playing around with image/text generators to amuse myself a few days ago. *wub* PURELY TARNISHED!! Smokey the Bear disapproves of this pairing. Hehehehehe...... That bastard outbid me by, like, twenty bucks >.> I need to get a life. And to take out the trash.
More along, folks. Nothing to see here.

I decided to post another piece of my practice art. This one is a pencil sketch. It's poorly shaded, funny looking, and... well.. I'll let it speak for itself. And yes, Shaidar Haran is quoting Elmyra from Tiny Toons.

I'm taking costume design, and we're working a lot on rendering techniques. Rae (the prof) insists that everyone can learn to draw passably well. I'm sort of inclined to disbelieve her, since I don't think my meager skills (or lack thereof, really) are going to get any better. But Rae tells us to practice practice practice! And since we need to turn in a full sketchbook at the end of the semester, I been practicing. >.> So this one sketch, I draw the face, some eyes, a body, doodled in some braids--and was like, "hey, Narishma!" So Narishma the sketch became. It's awful, and has more wrong with it than I care to think about. But I decided to post it anyway. "No, YOU get down on your knees and lick the mud off the carpet, Merise!" ...is what I imagine he'd be saying. Or something like that. >.> ...Yeah.

And oh, how I love thee, Church Sign Generator. I bought, like, twenty tickets. And I built a shrine, because this place is sacred. Oh Perrin, it's not us you need to convince. I bought every copy ever made. And I still can't get enough. Moridin promised to do something special to prove his love, but Rand had no idea he would go so far. Oh, Dubya. You know you like it. That is all.

So I was browsing around adultfanfiction.net today, ended up in the Harry Potter section, and came across something that has always had me torn between amusement and bemusement--male pregnancy (mpreg). I don't think I've ever read a "good" mpreg fic. I mean, the sheer implausibility of the premise kinda disallows quality. And yet, I've always found mpreg stories to be wildly entertaining--maybe it's just the whole "men have to experience the nastiness of pregnancy" factor (not that I've ever experienced it myself, thankfully), or maybe it's that lingering image of a nine-months-along Arnold Schwarzenegger from Junior that always has me laughing (I loved that movie). Or maybe some other factor that I just can't pinpoint. It almost makes me want to write an mpreg fic. It would, of course, be completely horrible. But the image of a pregnant Rand al'Thor just makes my whole world seem bright and sparkly. Rand would be so cute with a bun in the oven Or maybe Galad, or Logain, or Narishma, or Mat. Mpreg is probably the last thing the WoT fandom needs. It's probably the last thing any fandom needs. But... But... It's so amusing. In unrelated news, I got the Asha'man Dragon pin for Christmas. Now I just need the sword, and I'll be a real Asha'man! Well, almost.

A loooong time ago, I had an lj. I logged onto the site recently, and was somewhat piqued to discover it had been purged, despite the fact that I hadn't used it in years. So I decided to make another. 

Not that I'll ever do anything with it, and probably won't update again. But it makes me feel happy (at least at 6:30am) to have one again.
